Most Illustrious Sir

In the capacity of Colonel Chief of the Legion of National Guards of this District and duly authorized by the Most Excellent Sir Your Lordship Captain Francisco Xavier, commander of the forces besieging the town of São José do Norte, so that not only is it prevented that the enemies seize them, but also to supply our divisions with such an article, should it be necessary.

2nd — To all persons who take said ponchos, Your Lordship to send Manuel Rodrigues Cordeiro to the Most Excellent Sir Bento Gonçalves da Silva. From now on, may Your Lordship

God keep Your Lordship

Estate of Pântano Grande, August 9, 1836.

Most Illustrious Sir Joaquim José de Freitas  
Justice of the Peace of the Parish of Mostardas.  
Domingos José de Almeida  
Colonel Chief of the Legion of the District of Rio Grande.
